刻みタバコ: (きざみタバコ) - shredded tobacco; pipe tobacco
刻み付ける: (きざみつける) - to engrave; to carve out
刻み目: (きざみめ) - notch; nick; marks on a ruler
刻み込む: (きざみこむ) - to etch (name, etc.); to carve (design)
刻む: (きざむ) - to mince/to cut fine/to chop up/to hash/to shred; to carve/to engrave/to chisel/to notch; to tick away (time)/to record the passing moments; (as 心に刻む, etc.)  to etch (into one's mind)/to remember distinctly; to have tattooed; to torment
刻一刻: (こくいっこく) - moment by moment; hour by hour
刻一刻と: (こくいっこくと) - moment by moment; hour by hour
刻刻: (こくこく) - moment by moment; hour by hour
刻刻に: (こっこくに) - moment by moment; hour by hour
刻時パルス: (こくじパルス) - clock signal; clock pulse
刻時信号: (こくじしんごう) - clock signal; clock pulse
刻苦勉励: (こっくべんれい) - (yoji) being arduous; working diligently enduring hardships
刻苦精励: (こっくせいれい) - (yoji) being arduous; working diligently enduring hardships; making a strenuous effort
刻苦精進: (こっくしょうじん) - (yoji) being arduous; working diligently enduring hardships; making a strenuous effort
刻薄: (こくはく) - cruel; inhumane; callous; brutal
剃り捨てる: (そりすてる) - to cut off the hair; take the tonsure
剃り落とす: (すりおとす) - to shave off the hair
剃上げ額: (すりあげびたい) - high and broad forehead
剃刀研ぎ: (かみそりとぎ) - one who sharpens razors
剃刀菜: (コウゾリナ) - hawkweed oxtongue (Picris hieracioides subsp. japonica)
剃立て: (そりたて) - clean shaven; freshly shaven
剃髪: (ていはつ) - tonsure; cutting off the hair
剄る: (くびきる) - to behead/to decapitate; to fire/to dismiss
則: (soku) - regra, contador de regras; norma, regulamento
則する: (そくする) - to conform to; to agree with; to be adapted to; to be based on
則ち: (すなわち) - that is; namely; i.e.
則る: (のっとる) - to conform to; to be in accordance with; to follow (rule, tradition, example, etc.)
則天去私: (そくてんきょし) - (yoji) selfless devotion to justice
削: (saku/kezu) - plane , plane, sharpen, whittle, pare, shave (leather), scrape off, crossout, reduce, curtail
削がれる: (そがれる) - (passive voice)  to be dampened; to be discouraged; to be weakened; to be reduced
削ぎ切り: (そぎぎり) - cutting a thin object (e.g. vegetable stalk) at a 45 degree angle; cutting in a way that blunts or rounds the cut
削ぎ落とす: (そぎおとす) - to chip off; to scrape off; to prune
削ぐ: (そぐ) - to chip (off)/to shave (off)/to slice (off)/to sharpen; to dampen (e.g. enthusiasm)/to discourage/to weaken/to reduce
削げる: (そげる) - to split; to be split; to splinter
削りとる: (けずりとる) - to shave off; to scrape off
削り代: (けずりしろ) - cutting stock (extra material cut off in machining operations as a safety margin for tolerances); machining allowance
削り出す: (けずりだす) - to machine; to cut; to scrape
削り取る: (けずりとる) - to shave off; to scrape off
削り花: (けずりばな) - wooden flower whittled from a log
削り落とす: (けずりおとす) - to scrape off; to plane off
削る: (はつる) - to shave off (esp. concrete); to take a percentage/to take a cut
削れる: (けずれる) - to be shaved or planed
削岩機: (さくがんき) - rock drill; pneumatic drill; jackhammer
削進: (さくしん) - excavation (esp. of a tunnel); drivage
削除抽象操作: (さくじょちゅうしょうそうさ) - delete abstract-operation
剌激: (しげき) - stimulus; impetus; incentive; encouragement; motivation; provocation; excitement; thrill
前々: (まえまえ) - beforehand; for a long time
前々から: (まえまえから) - for a long time; since long ago; always; already; far in advance (e.g. reservation)
前々回: (ぜんぜんかい) - the time before last; last time but one
前かがみになる: (まえかがみになる) - to slouch; to stoop; to bend forward; to lean forward
前がん病変: (ぜんがんびょうへん) - precancerous lesion
前に買った分: (まえにかったぶん) - the lot I bought earlier
前に述べたように: (まえにのべたように) - as discussed previously; as mentioned above
前のめり: (まえのめり) - pitching forward, as if to fall.
前ぶれ: (まえぶれ) - previous notice; herald; harbinger; portent; advance warning
前ほど: (まえほど) - (sometines written 前程) to the previous extent
前もって: (まえもって) - in advance; beforehand; previously
